notes: Phase 3 complete. All 15 tasks plus IU-3A/IU-3B implemented. Filter controls (3 neon buttons All/Active/Done) with animated card visibility transitions; raycaster-based hover with glow/scale feedback; action panel (Complete/Edit/Delete with 2s confirmation); press-and-hold drag with 3D plane projection, ghost-shift preview, and spring snap-to-grid; EffectComposer with BloomEffect + ChromaticAberration + Vignette in single combined pass; bloom spikes on task events; FPS monitor auto-disables post-processing below 30fps for 3s. Tests: 53/53 pass. Build: clean.
